'''Aisa Bathhouse''' is a point of interest in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]].

==NPCs==
*[[Aikawa Susumu]]

==Trivia==
*The characters on the sea duck-shaped signboard read "ST" in the [[Inazuman Language]], probably meaning ''{{w|Sentō|sentou}}'' (Japanese communal bathhouse).
